name: buyer_intent_to_exchange_property_info
title: Please describe the current property you will be exchanging?
label: Exchange Property
description: Include key details about the property you plan to exchange, such as its address, type of property, approximate value, and current use.
tips: A quick overview of the status of the exchange is important for the seller's consideration of your offer. This would include type of property, if it is it under contract, closing date, name of the Qualified Intermediary, etc.
small_print: Clear information helps streamline the 1031 exchange process. The property description provided will be used in the purchase agreement and 1031 exchange documentation. Ensure all information is accurate and can be verified.
